commitResults.messageTitle: Add echo feature, exit command, and style output message

commitResults.messageBody:
- Implement array to store user input
- Implement list command to display content of array sequentially
- Implement sanitizeTask function to handle typographical errors by user
- Implement switch-case for command query

commitResults.messageTitle: feat(task status): add status for each task
commitResults.messageBody:
- Implement Task class to store task detail
- Implement mark and unmark command
- Implement extractTrailingNumber function to update desired task

- Replaced default Duke responses with ShinChan style lines
- Centralised message in persona class
- Update bye, list, mark, unmark and default response tone

- Move repeated getStatusIcon + getDescription logic into Task class
- Simplifies list, mark and unmark outputs

commitResults.messageTitle: refactor: replace string concat with StringBuilder for task listing

commitResults.messageBody:
- Move Scanner init outside while loop
- Prevent unnecessary Scanner object creation on System.in
- Improved resource handling and code efficiency

- Add bounds checking for task indices in mark/unmark
- Prevent crash when input number missing or out of range
- Prevent empty input for add command

commitResults.messageTitle: fix(mark): add missing parenthesis in conditional so task prints correctly
refactor(command): replace string-based switch with enums
commitResults.messageBody:
- Introduced Command enum to represent valid user commands
- Replaced string-based parsing with enum-based switch

- Override toString() to print formatted task
- Remove printTask() from Task class

commitResults.messageTitle: refactor(command): extract showList method and rename sanitizeMessage to extractCommand
feat(task): add Todo, Deadline, Event commands
commitResults.messageBody:
- Implemented corresponding classes:
 * Todo extends Task
 * Deadline extends Todo
 * Event extends Deadline
- Update command handler to construct and display these tasks

commitResults.messageTitle: test: update input.txt and EXPECTED.txt for automated testing
refactor(task): extract date formatting and  unify content parsing
commitResults.messageBody:
- Introduced formateDate() to encapsulate date formatting logic used by
  deadline and event tasks
- Renamed extractContent() to extractContents() and refactored it to
  return a String[] array shared by addTodo, addDeadline and addEvent
- Renamed Personal#addTaskDescription to addTask and overloaded it:
  * addTask() for default task addition
  * addTask(String) for Todo, Deadline, and Event message summary
